description: A vehicle is thought to have caused the damage by repeatedly crashing into fencing in Glion Gill.
title: Driver rams fencing in unexplained rampage at plantation
title_page: Driver rams fencing in unexplained rampage at plantation - BBC News
maintext: Five field gates were destroyed in the apparently deliberate act at Glion Gill, near Greeba, when the vehicle tore through them, forcing them to break, officers said.
